backDesc: I [b]blow[/b] out the candle on the cake. / He [b]blew[/b] up the balloon. / The balloon has been [b]blown[/b] up.

backDesc: I [b]broadcast[/b] a radio show. / He [b]broadcast[/b] the news live. / The news has been [b]broadcast[/b].

frontDesc: Я палю свічку під час вечері. / Вона спалила папери у печі. / Папери спалено.
backDesc: I [b]burn[/b] a candle during dinner. / She [b]burnt[/b] the papers in the furnace. / The papers have been [b]burnt[/b].

frontDesc: Я підірвав повітряну кулю під час гри. / Він вибухнув від сміху. / Сміх вибухнув.

frontDesc: Я прощаю тебе за помилку. / Вона пробачила його за все. / Помилку пробачено.
backDesc: I [b]forgive[/b] you for the mistake. / She [b]forgave[/b] him for everything. / The mistake has been [b]forgiven[/b].

frontDesc: Я заморожую фрукти для майбутнього. / Він заморозив воду в холодильнику. / Вода заморожена.
backDesc: I [b]freeze[/b] fruits for later. / He [b]froze[/b] the water in the fridge. / The water has been [b]frozen[/b].

frontDesc: Я чіпляюся за маму під час бурі. / Він чіплявся за свої переконання. / Переконання чіплялися.
backDesc: I [b]clung[/b] to my mother during the storm. / He [b]clung[/b] to his beliefs. / The beliefs have been [b]clung[/b] to.

frontDesc: Я повзаю крізь траву, щоб мене не помітили. / Вона повзла тихо. / Повзання було тихим.
backDesc: I [b]creep[/b] through the grass to avoid being noticed. / She [b]crept[/b] quietly. / It has been [b]crept[/b] quietly.

backDesc: I [b]deal[/b] in stocks on the market. / He [b]dealt[/b] the goods in the store. / The goods have been [b]dealt[/b].

frontDesc: Я копаю канал в саду. / Вона копала до колодязя. / Колодязь викопано.
backDesc: I [b]dig[/b] a trench in the garden. / She [b]dug[/b] to the well. / The well has been [b]dug[/b].

frontDesc: Я сів на лавку в парку. / Він сів на пагорбі. / Пагорб було зайнято.
backDesc: I [b]alighted[/b] on a bench in the park. / He [b]alit[/b] on the hill. / The hill has been [b]alit[/b].

frontDesc: Нещастя трапляється з тією родиною. / Йому трапилося невезіння. / Невезіння трапилося.
backDesc: Misfortune [b]befell[/b] that family. / He [b]befell[/b] bad luck. / The bad luck has been [b]befallen[/b].

backDesc: I [b]behold[/b] the sunset. / She [b]beheld[/b] a beautiful landscape. / The landscape has been [b]beheld[/b].

frontDesc: Я благаю тебе про допомогу. / Він просив вибачення. / Вибачення просили.
backDesc: I [b]beseech[/b] you for help. / He [b]besought[/b] forgiveness. / Forgiveness has been [b]besought[/b].

frontDesc: Його переслідували проблеми. / Він оточив свої цілі. / Цілі обтяжено.
backDesc: He was [b]beset[/b] by financial problems. / He [b]beset[/b] his targets. / The targets have been [b]beset[/b].

backDesc: Parents [b]chided[/b] the child for disobedience. / He [b]chided[/b] him publicly. / The child has been [b]chidden[/b].

backDesc: I [b]clothe[/b] myself for winter. / She [b]clad[/b] herself elegantly. / The clothing has been [b]clad[/b].

backDesc: I [b]dream[/b] of vacations. / He [b]dreamt[/b] of a trip. / The vacation has been [b]dreamt[/b] of.

backDesc: I [b]feed[/b] the dog every day. / She [b]fed[/b] the birds in the garden. / The birds have been [b]fed[/b].

backDesc: I [b]flee[/b] from the rain. / She [b]fled[/b] from home. / The home has been [b]fled[/b].

backDesc: I [b]fling[/b] a stone into the water. / He [b]flung[/b] the bottle out the window. / The bottle has been [b]flung[/b].

backDesc: I [b]forbid[/b] smoking in the building. / She [b]forbade[/b] the children from watching TV. / Watching TV has been [b]forbidden[/b].

backDesc: I [b]forecast[/b] rain for tomorrow. / He [b]forecast[/b] a price increase. / The price increase has been [b]forecast[/b].

backDesc: I [b]forsake[/b] old habits. / She [b]forsook[/b] her dreams. / The dreams have been [b]forsaken[/b].

backDesc: I [b]knit[/b] a sweater for winter. / She [b]knitted[/b] a scarf. / The scarf has been [b]knit[/b].

backDesc: I [b]mow[/b] the grass in the garden. / He [b]mowed[/b] the lawn yesterday. / The lawn has been [b]mown[/b].

frontDesc: Я стригу вівці на фермі. / Він стриг вівцю вчора. / Вівцю постригли.
backDesc: I [b]shear[/b] sheep on the farm. / He [b]sheared[/b] a sheep yesterday. / The sheep has been [b]shorn[/b].

backDesc: I [b]thrust[/b] the door to open it. / He [b]thrust[/b] the door hard. / The door has been [b]thrust[/b].

backDesc: I [b]tread[/b] carefully on the wet floor. / He [b]trod[/b] with a confident stride. / The floor has been [b]trodden[/b] carefully.

backDesc: I [b]undo[/b] the move I made. / He [b]undid[/b] the changes in the document. / The changes have been [b]undone[/b].
